revised_title: Intravenous Injections of Diamino-Acridine Sulphate: Confer Bactericidal Properties on Blood
tldr: The authors investigate the bactericidal properties of intravenous injections of diamino-acridine sulphate, finding that it enhances the bactericidal action in serum and is less toxic to mammalian tissues. This substance has potential for use in treating bacterial infections.
